content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to create a new directory called "river_data". I used the "append
"""

"""

type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": the new file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "./new_directory/new_file.txt", "text": "\\nThis is some additional text that I am appending to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "./new_directory/new_file.txt", "old_text": "new", "new_text": "old", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/new_directory/new_file.txt updated successfully.', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned:
